name: Make Hexa Puzzle
description:
"Make Hexa Puzzle" is a simple yet addictive gameplay that challenges your brain.
Simply drag the same-colored triangles to make multiple Hexagons!
Discover the most unique mobile game of the year and find your new addiction right now!


The KING of BRAIN TEASERS!
Do you enjoy the puzzle games? Do you like lovely colors?
Here comes the perfect game for you, Make Hexa Puzzle!


FEATURES
• BLOCK MATCH PUZZLE
- Ideal for all ages
- Play easily and quickly.

• EASY AND FUN PLAY
- Easy to learn and fun to master gameplay

• NO TIME LIMIT
- Enjoy game for any time, anywhere and a short time.

• NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM!
- You can play offline in anytime.

• INSTANT SAVE!
- Always save the game when you quit or turn off your phone.

• STUNNING GRAPHICS
- Soothing sounds and gorgeous visual effects.

NOTES
• Make Hexa Puzzle contain ads like banner, interstitial, video and house ads.
• Make Hexa Puzzle is free to play, but you can purchase In-app items like AD FREE and Coins

SUPPORT UNIVERSAL APP
• Enjoy the game with various devices. (Phones and Tablets)
